hero.title: Over 10 Years of Experience
hero.subtitle: With over 10 years of experience in Pomeranian breeding, we have established ourselves as specialized breeders, and for the past 5 years, we have focused on importing exclusive quality lines, especially Korean Pomeranians.

happyClients.title: Over 100 Puppies Sold
happyClients.subtitle: We have had the privilege of exporting our puppies to over 15 countries around the world

experience.title: Over 10 Years of Experience
experience.subtitle: With over 10 years of experience in Pomeranian breeding, we have established ourselves as specialized breeders, and for the past 5 years, we have focused on importing exclusive quality lines, especially Korean Pomeranians.

breeding.title: Family Environment Breeding
breeding.subtitle: In our kennel, located in a spacious and safe environment, our puppies are raised in a family environment, full of toys, structures and activities that favor their physical and emotional development.

certifications.title: International Certifications
certifications.subtitle: We are proud to be registered with FCI (Fédération Cynologique Internationale) and AKC (American Kennel Club) as responsible breeders, which allows us to offer 100% legitimate dogs with guaranteed quality.

difference.title: The POMELOVE KOREA Difference
difference.description: Unlike other pages, we are NOT RESELLERS or intermediaries. We sell exclusively our own specimens, bred and selected with the greatest dedication and care.

exports.title: Pomeranian Exporters
exports.subtitle: In addition to being breeders, we are also Pomeranian exporters. We have had the privilege of exporting our puppies to over 15 countries around the world.

cta.title: In our kennel, we not only offer you a puppy, but a life companion 🐕
cta.description: Our passion for this breed has led us to offer only the best for our puppies, always guaranteeing high standards in all our processes.
